title: Watch: King Charles, Queen Camilla escorted away due to false security alert while eating ice cream
'Used to watch Bengals games': What Vivek Ramaswamy said about Trump's VP pick JD Vance
content: Vivek Ramaswamy has publicly endorsed Donald Trump's choice of JD Vance as his running mate for the forthcoming US presidential elections. Ramaswamy, who attended law school with Vance, fondly recalled their time together watching Bengals games at the bar and expressed amazement at their progress over the past ten years.
summary: Vivek Ramaswamy has publicly endorsed Donald Trump's choice of JD Vance as his running mate for the forthcoming US presidential elections. Ramaswamy, who attended law school with Vance, fondly recalled their time together watching Bengals games at the bar and expressed amazement at their progress over the past ten years.

title: If elected, JD Vance to be first vice president with beard in nearly 100 years
Elon Musk to give $45 million a month to pro-Trump super PAC
content: Elon Musk has committed to contributing $45 million per month to a pro-Donald Trump political group, significantly boosting the Republican nominee's reelection campaign finances through the November election. This substantial financial support aims to enhance Trump's fundraising advantage over President Joe Biden, who has recently faced a donor revolt and calls for a new nominee.
summary: Elon Musk has committed to contributing $45 million per month to a pro-Donald Trump political group, significantly boosting the Republican nominee's reelection campaign finances through the November election. This substantial financial support aims to enhance Trump's fundraising advantage over President Joe Biden, who has recently faced a donor revolt and calls for a new nominee.

Trump makes first appearance since assassination bid, attends Republican convention with bandaged ear
'Bull's-eye comment on Trump was mistake': Biden amid assassination allegations
content: On Tuesday, US President Joe Biden acknowledged his comment about putting Donald Trump "in a bull's-eye" was a mistake, amid criticism that such rhetoric could have incited violence against the former president. Several Trump supporters accused Biden and Democrats of fostering hostility towards Trump, citing Biden's remarks in a private call with donors. Biden defended himself, clarifying that he meant focusing attention on Trump's actions and policies, not advocating violence.
summary: On Tuesday, US President Joe Biden acknowledged his comment about putting Donald Trump "in a bull's-eye" was a mistake, amid criticism that such rhetoric could have incited violence against the former president. Several Trump supporters accused Biden and Democrats of fostering hostility towards Trump, citing Biden's remarks in a private call with donors. Biden defended himself, clarifying that he meant focusing attention on Trump's actions and policies, not advocating violence.

Who is Usha Chilukuri Vance? The Indian-origin wife of Trump's Vice President pick
content: Usha Chilukuri Vance, a distinguished litigator with strong Indian cultural values, has been announced as Donald Trump's running mate in the upcoming US presidential elections. Her legal background and contributions to her husband's political success have positioned her as a key figure in this partnership.

Trump shooter had a social media account; purchased 50 rounds of ammunition: Details
content: ​The account was rarely used and there was no post indicative of the attack. "It was rarely utilized, has not been used in months, and we have found no evidence that it was used to plan this incident, promote violence, or discuss his political views," the spokesperson said. "Discord strongly condemns violence of any kind, including political violence, and we will continue to coordinate closely with law enforcement."
